decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - A.	The proposal for the continued use of the premises for the servicing of motor vehicles results in an unsatisfactory impact on adjoining residential properties in terms of traffic generation.  has had an adverse impact on adjoining residential properties, in particular at No. 70 Thorney Hedge Road, in terms of damage to the dwelling wall and front fence. The proposal therefore has a detrimental impact on residential amenity.

Condition : 2 - B.	The accessway to the site is insufficient to meet the needs of a Class B2 commercial premises and will have an adverse impact on residential and pedestrian traffic in the area as well as adjoining residential property. The traffic impacts of the commercial use are considered to be detrimental to the residential amenity of the area and is considered to be undesirable.
description: Renewal of planning permission ref (01121/B/P7) for continued use of garage for servicing of motor vehicles.
